Leonardo Faife

I'm Leonardo Faife, a Computer Science student at the University of Central Florida. My passions revolve around technology, sports, outdoor adventures, and creative expressions. In the realm of technology, I'm eager to learn and grow focusing on expanding my skills in web development, aiming to blend creativity with technology to create engaging and dynamic websites.

Sports play a significant role in my life, with volleyball and soccer being my favorites. When times are tough, I find pleasure in running for getting either in shape or clearing my mind. Beyond technology and sports, I seek adventure either by exploring different continents and cultures, through dance and photography while also having an interest in modeling and UX-Design
